short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Flixzilla experience with just one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you use Flixzilla on a daily basis, you cannot live without this extension.

Use the Flixzilla extension to:
• Greatly increase the list of servers available.
• Start using the website without any friction.

Even without the extension, you can: 
• Save your show progress.
• Bookmark shows and movies for later watching.
• Synchronize your data across multiple devices.

Happy watching!
